welcome_message_body: Welcome to Rahimyar Khan, Pakistan! Known for its rich agricultural heritage and historic landmarks, we invite you to explore the city's charm and enjoy all it has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Sheikh Zayed International Airport, handling both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal dedicated to domestic flights within Pakistan.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi for 2 hours by providing their flight details.
